articles.author: Man City
articles.title: Guardiola previews Real Madrid clash - Manchester City FC
articles.description: Pep Guardiola says he is proud of Manchester City’s achievements in Europe this season, regardless of whether we are able to reach a second successive Champions League final.
articles.content:
City welcome Real Madrid to the Etihad Stadium on Tuesday 26 April for the first leg of our semi-final clash, with kick-off scheduled for 20:00 (UK).

articles.title: Leinster boss warns SA of 'war on two fronts' - SARugbymag
articles.description: Leo Cullen says South African teams have the luxury of “recharging their batteries” while the Europeans battle in two competitions simultaneously.
articles.content:
Leo Cullen says South African teams have the luxury of recharging their batteries while the Europeans battle in two competitions simultaneously.
